name: Beat of the Pixel Heat
description:
Beat of The Pixel Heat is a rhythm game in which you must control HEAT, an artificial intelligence responsible for defending cyberspace from a wave of viral elements that have invaded your home!

The game is currently in development, and with each update in the project, new stages and game modes may arrive.

The songs used can be found through newgrounds.com, with the rights reserved to their respective composers. More information and links in the readme attached to the game download.

Thanks for playing!
